item.name: Bank Account

request.description: Create a bank account or a credit card account for your organization.
Modify the account that was created.
Get a detailed look of the account specified.
List all bank and credit card accounts for your organization.
Delete a bank account from your organization.
Get the details of previously imported statement for the account.
Delete the statement that was previously imported.

item.description: In Zoho Books, you can track your transactions, have manual and automatic feeds imported for your bank and credit card accounts.

item.name: Bank Rule

request.description: Create a rule and apply it on deposit/withdrawal for bank accounts and on refund/charges for credit card accounts.
Make changes to the rule, add or modify it and update.
Get details of a specific rule.
Fetch all the rules created for a specified bank or credit card account ID
Delete a rule from your account and make it no longer applicable on the transactions.

item.description: In Zoho Books, you can automate the categorization of the bank feeds. The transaction rules feature in banking will help you in automatically identifying the bank transaction and categorizing it under the criteria provided by you.

request.description: Create a sales order for your customer

item.name: Mark a Sales Order as Open
Mark a Sales Order as Void
Add Attachment to a Sales Order
